about.summary: These datasets support the implementation in R of the software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment), which is a free tool that calculates the alignment between corporate lending portfolios and climate scenarios (<https://2degrees-investing.org/>). Financial institutions use 'PACTA' to study how their capital allocation decisions align with climate change mitigation goals. Because both financial institutions and market data providers keep their data private, this package provides fake, public data to enable the development and use of 'PACTA' in R.

These datasets support the implementation in R of the software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment), which is a free tool that calculates the alignment between corporate lending portfolios and climate scenarios (<https://2degrees-investing.org/>). Financial institutions use 'PACTA' to study how their capital allocation decisions align with climate change mitigation goals. Because both financial institutions and market data providers keep their data private, this package provides fake, public data to enable the development and use of 'PACTA' in R.

name: r-r2dii.data
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-r2dii.data
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/r2dii.data_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/r2dii.data/r2dii.data_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 836ef6b61a4acf27cb5a33d4615df613ca94fc5f2eab72368271a510492ec994

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base {{ rbase }}
    - r-lifecycle
  run:
    - r-base {{ rbase }}
    - r-lifecycle

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('r2dii.data')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('r2dii.data')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii.data/, https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.data
  license: CC0-1.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: These datasets support the implementation in R of the software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment), which is a free tool that calculates the alignment between corporate lending portfolios and climate scenarios (<https://2degrees-investing.org/>). Financial institutions use 'PACTA' to study
    how their capital allocation decisions align with climate change mitigation goals. Because both financial institutions and market data providers keep their data private, this package provides fake, public data to enable the development and use of 'PACTA' in R.
  license_family: CC

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - FernandezMathieu

# Description: These datasets support the implementation in R of the software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment), which is a free tool that calculates the alignment between corporate lending portfolios and climate scenarios (<https://2degrees-investing.org/>). Financial institutions use 'PACTA' to study how their capital allocation decisions align with climate change mitigation goals. Because both financial institutions and market data providers keep their data private, this package provides fake, public data to enable the development and use of 'PACTA' in R.
